pages.text: $(li)The Snowy Taiga is variant of the Taiga biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)This biome is composed of mostly by Dirt but it is covered on top with a layer of snow.

$(li)In this place you can find some vegetation like Red and Brown Mushrooms, Dandelions, Violets, Taiga trees.$(br)$(li)Some animals like Grizzly Bears can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Snowy Taiga$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
